|chip2 = Atheros;AR9462; |chip3 = Wilocity;Wil6110; |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |nqam = |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |antconn2 = U.FL |antenna2 = |txchains2 = 2 |rxchains2 = 2 |sstreams2 = 2 |wirelessstand2 = IEEE 802.11ad |802.11ad2 = 4600 |wififreq2 = 60 |receive_sens2 = |transmit_power2 = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = USI |manuf_model = QCA9005 |manuf_rev = (WIL6110) |addchip = WiGig 60GHz RFIC chip;Wilosity;Wil6110;;1; |flags = bluetooth |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ad |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = reference design |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 11/01/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00K0DHWRG |asin_country = |asin2 = B00PEPZB8M |asin_country2 = |asin3 = B00UX1X53K |asin_country3 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The module shown in the FCC photos appears to be manufactured by ''[[USI]]'' (Taiwan). :"PCB0063121" is silkscreened on the board. *'''Dell Wireless 1601 / DW1601''' :Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n + Bluetooth + WiGig (60GHz) :Half-Height Mini-PCI Express Card :P/N: 8V256, JN0P4 This device will presumably be bundled in with the [http://www.anandtech.com/show/6423/dell-latitude-6430u-brings-wilocitys-80211ad-wigig-solution-to-consumers Dell Latitude 6430u] (ultrabook). :The photo used in this listing appears to be the older AR9004TB module :(which is presumed to actually use AR9462 rather than the pictured AR9642). *Dell Latitude 6430u, E5440, E5540, E6430, E7240, E7440 (JN0P4) :Note: could not work on IBM/Lenovo/Thinkpad/HP Version Laptop 
Frequency Range (MHz)	Output Watts
60480.0 - 62640.0	0.2291
From the FCC test report.. *1x1+BT :chain0: 11a/b/g/n (MCS0-7) :chain1: BT :BT - WLAN/BT concurrent *2x2+BT :chain0: 11a/n (MCS0-15) :chain1: 11a/n (MCS0-15) + BT *2x2 WLAN only :chain0: 11a/b/g/n (MCS0-15) :chain1: 11a/b/g/n (MCS0-15) [[Category:English Documentation]]
